storyInfo: The Sankta can feel each other's emotions, and Fiammetta was the only Liberi in her four man squad. Can Mostima and Lemuen understand Fiammetta's anger?

attributes.content: Tell me more!
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Oh, be careful with the candle! Don't get burnt!
attributes.name: Rosella

attributes.content: Ah! Can't mess up the shape... It won't look pretty.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: I need to... make it look nicer... for Mamma.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Alright, I've told you a lot already. It's all boring adventures and the same old day-to-day life. As for Kazdel in the legends...
attributes.name: Rosella

attributes.content: It's kind of embarrassing to say, but none of us have ever been.
attributes.name: Rosella

attributes.content: Kazdel is to the Sarkaz... like what Laterano is to the Sankta, right? It's the Sarkaz homeland...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Everyone's gotta be very happy. There are cotton candy food trucks, right? And candy stores, too... There are lots of happy Sarkaz on the streets, all of them saying hi to each other!
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Maybe...
attributes.name: Rosella

attributes.content: It could be like that, one day.
attributes.name: Rosella

attributes.content: Why don't we talk about you instead, Cecelia? What are your papa and mama like?
attributes.name: Rosella

attributes.content: I... I don't actually know...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: I haven't seen Papà that many times... Every time we went to see him, Mamma did a lot of work to prepare, and we always left at night... We walked very far... to the forest.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: We met him in the forest, and he wore a big cape, like he hurried to us from somewhere far away...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: I don't actually remember what he looks like very well, but I remember his horns! They're black and straight, and they twinkle bright under the moonlight!
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: He took me by my hand and walked around the forest. He told me the names of the trees and how old they were... It gets very quiet at night outside the city. You don't even hear fowlbeasts. But I was never scared.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: He grabbed my hand so tight. It kinda hurt... but I didn't say anything.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Every time we saw each other, he looked like he was even happier than I was! And he also looked... a little nervous?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: When I got tired, Mamma would carry me on her back and take me home. When I looked back, Papà would be there under the big tree. He kept looking at us. Even after we got very far away, he would still stand there...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Your mama and papa are both wonderful people.
attributes.name: Rosella

attributes.content: Mamma's amazing! She knows how to do everything!
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Look. This is Mamma's guardian gun! Ezell gave it to me.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Mamma said that Papà couldn't beat her in a fight if he tried... She always let Papà win! But I know Papà's really amazing, too!
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Haha, Cecelia. When I say 'wonderful,' it probably doesn't mean the same thing as what you mean by 'amazing.'
attributes.name: Rosella

attributes.content: Really? I'm sure Papà and Mamma are both wonderful and amazing!
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Mamma never told me how she met Papà, though. Every time I asked her, she would start talking about something else... Why didn't she want to tell me?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: When you're still a kid, there are a lot of other, more important things. Do you like watching tea brew? When I was your age, I loved looking at brewing tea. The water would get darker and darker by the second...
attributes.name: Rosella

attributes.content: Rosella... The way you're talking about something else now is just like Mamma...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: I may look like I don't know a lot, but actually... I know a little.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: I ran all around the city yesterday, but I didn't see any Sarkaz besides you... Sarkaz aren't supposed to come to Laterano, are they?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: That's why Papà and Mamma shouldn't be together... No, I mean, there is somebody who doesn't want him to be with Mamma, right?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: No, there's no such thing as two people who shouldn't be together... All this will change. And it won't be too long from now... It will happen.
attributes.name: Rosella

attributes.content: Love isn't a crime.
attributes.name: Rosella

attributes.content: I understand...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: That's why we are here.
attributes.name: Rosella

attributes.content: And when that day comes, can I walk around Laterano all I want?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Rosella

attributes.content: I won't have to hide in my room anymore? I can visit all the candy stores in Laterano one at a time?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Just once? You can go as many times as you want.
attributes.name: Rosella

attributes.content: Wow... I want that day to come soon... I wanna grow up soon!
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Right, maybe if you grow up soon, it'll just...
attributes.name: Rosella

attributes.content: No, Cecelia, there's no hurry. When I was your age, I also thought that growing up would solve everything, but when I finally grew up...
attributes.name: Rosella

attributes.content: Growing up is very, very, very tough, Cecelia, and it will be even harder for you. The burden that you'll carry on your shoulders... No, never mind. You're still a kid. Let's not think about that.
attributes.name: Rosella

attributes.content: Even though everyone grows up?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Right... We don't have a choice but to grow up.
attributes.name: Rosella

attributes.content: Rosella, who has been smiling the whole time, suddenly seems somewhat lonely, all of a sudden.
She looks out the chapel's window at the graveyard outside. It's full of blooming flowers, and in the distance, the tall statue in the center of Lateran City makes a faint impression.
She starts humming a song, sorrowful but with a hint of hope.
Oh, that song! You hummed it yesterday too...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: When Mamma taught me that song, she said she didn't know the words anymore, so she always just sang it with lalalas, but I really like how it sounds... What is the song actually about?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: This is a Sarkaz song. It's about a hero who's about to go on a journey to do something really amazing, and that's why everyone sang this song to say their goodbyes and send him on his way, hoping he'll come back safely.
attributes.name: Rosella

attributes.content: The hero of the song is going somewhere far away to fulfill his dreams...
attributes.name: Rosella

attributes.content: It may be a long, long journey, but he will surely, certainly...
attributes.name: Rosella

attributes.content: Mister Ezell! Mister Friar!
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: What are you chatting about?
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Good day, Guide—Nothing important. Just old stories about the Sarkaz and a few trivial topics.
attributes.name: Rosella

attributes.content: I'm having fun... I've never talked to someone so long.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Mister Ezell, did you pick these flowers?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Yes, I thought... we could extract the flower's fragrance and give the candles a little scent.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Fragrance can help guide the departed in the right direction.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: That's so nice! Thanks, Mister Ezell!
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Um... Actually... I'm... I'm a little scared.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: When I say goodbye to Mamma at the funeral... That's going to be the last goodbye, right?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Does that really mean I can't see her anymore? Not even on holidays? Not even once in a long while, like Papà? Even... if I just want her to pat my head?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Even... Even if...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: There's still a story about an angel and a burdenbeast... that she hasn't finished telling me?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Cecelia...
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Tonight's the last time, Cecelia.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: I'll stay with you in your mama's room tonight, okay? All of us will be there. You won't be alone.
attributes.name: Rosella

attributes.content: A Sarkaz watching over a Sankta child and her mother...
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: The candlelight may be feeble, but it too can light up the path to the other side.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Lemuen, we're here to see you.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: We brought you some dessert.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: A fruit tart I swiped from the Basilica.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Welcome. By the way, that cactus looks disgusting.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: That's our girl, Lemuen. You've got fine eyes.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Do you two really miss me so much that you have to visit every day?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: We could come see you every hour, if that's what you want.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Trying to curry favor, are you, Mostima? And you, Fiammetta... That's a terrible smile if I've ever seen one.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Did something happen?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: It's Andoain...
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: You ran into him.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: We encountered a Sarkaz who had infiltrated Laterano, and when I was chasing her... I saw his Originium Arts firsthand.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I see. It's good that you aren't hurt.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Lemuen, are you sure you're okay here? This is a normal hospital. If he...
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: He's paid me a visit already.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: What did you just—
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: A silence descends upon the room.
Lemuen looks at the flowers on the table.
The way you two talk about him is like... you're talking about a picnic you had over the weekend.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Lemuen, I'm not mad about you...
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: But, whenever we talk about him, you... and Mostima too. Each and every time, whenever I bring it up, you two always have that same look.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Whenever I see that expression on your faces, it makes me think... maybe it wasn't him who went crazy that day. That I lost my mind.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: We felt it, is all...
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Your Sankta hive mind again? Fine, you felt what he felt. Why did you point your gun at him, then?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: That has nothing to do with this. It didn't matter how... out of it he was, I couldn't let him take the Lock and Key.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: What about after that? You fell because of him! Does that not bother you?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Lemuen, it was his Arts that put you in this hospital. You fell into a coma for five whole years... does that not bother you?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Fiammetta...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Trust me, I'm on your side.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: It's just that I could really feel...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I don't want to hear that word anymore.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Do you think I'm mad about all this for no good reason?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Of course not, I understand...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Right, of course. All of you understand.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I'm the only one who doesn't.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Hey, Fiammetta!
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Fiammetta, Fiammetta!
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Shimmering Vigil!
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: You want me to bash your face in?!
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Listen to me!
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I've got something to say to you, Mostima!
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I'm done with you stinking Sankta already! Your empathy? The way you understand each other? I don't want to hear any of it!
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Did those halos fry your angel brains? You and Lemuen almost died in those ruins!
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Why aren't you angry? Why aren't you mad? Why am I the only one... the only one who's mad?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Don't give me that arrogant smile and that 'nothing matters' attitude! You had to leave Laterano and drift all across the world, bum out in the boonies. Whose fault do you think that was?!
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I followed you all the way to Victoria, to Leithanien, Sargon, Yan...
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: What do you think that was for?!
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: You, Lemuen, Andoain... our team. There was a time... when we trusted each other.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: What kind of God Almighty reason does he have anyway? What gave him the right to betray our trust? And what gave you two the right to understand him? Why should I have to understand him?!
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Do you know how much I miss those days? All those times we finished a mission after all those close calls... all those times Lemuen took us out to drinks... all those times we tried out a new dessert shop...
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Even those times he fixed our reports...
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: What gave him the right to ruin it all?!
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Those days...
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Those days... mean a lot to me...
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I understand...
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Fi...
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Lateran irises.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: They grow only in the Central Garden of Saint Marcel, the Sunset Chapel, and the Ecclesia Requietum in Stevonus.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Come on, we'll go together.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: You're my warden. Better make sure I'm not hurt on the job.
attributes.name: Mostima
